decision_conditions: <p><span style="line-height: normal;">The proposed rear dormer by reason of its excessive width would result in an obtrusive and visually cramped form of development within the rear roofslope&nbsp;</span>and would fail to respect the&nbsp; prevailing pattern of development in the area, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the host dwellinghouse and locality,&nbsp;<span style="line-height: normal;">contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy D3 D(7) and D(11) of The&nbsp; London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Harrow development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).</span><br></p>

<p><span style="line-height: normal;">The proposed front extension by reason of its excessive width, siting and forward projection&nbsp;would result in an obtrusive and visually dominate form of development </span>in the street scene and would detract from the character and appearance of the subject dwellinghouse and locality, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the host dwelling house, street scene and locality&nbsp;<span style="line-height: normal;">contrary, to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policy D3 D(7) and D(11) of The&nbsp; London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).</span><br></p>
description: Single storey front extension; single storey side extensions; single and two storey rear extension; single storey rear extension; new roof and rear dormer; external alterations
